subject: Disappointed with your sexual health?
body:
There is no need to exert yourself with silly doubts while you are in bed.
Order now!
You will have sex all night long. You won't think about erectile dysfunction anymore.
Go to the shop
Switch on your penis!
With best regards,
Mary Rich
 
 
A mne nabilo oskominu tvoe upriamstvo, Niks. 10. Nu tak proshchaj, Niksard, spokojno pozhelala Onni, nabliudaia za moimi Mucheniiami s dobrodushnoj nasmeshkoj, I da prebudet s toboj Svet. Kak znat. 
Po kakim-to sluchajnym, sovershenno Neubeditelnym dlia menia priznakam, vpolne dostatochnym dlia nih. I ty smog vosprotivitsia, kak ia vizhu, dejstviiu Prigovora, srok kotorogo daleko eshche ne istek. Vozmozhno, v eti dolgie mgnoveniia polnogo Uedineniia ia byl chutochku bezumen, projdia cherez sobstvennuiu smert, no kto Smog by eto proverit? Da i kakaia raznica. Eto chto eshche za ton, Niks! devushka vozmutilas. Ty zastavil Menia ostavit ee. Nichego luchshego na um ne prishlo. Ne ozhidal ot tebia takoj pryti. No Vestnik pribyl iavno ne dlia togo, chtoby zabrat dushu Mihkaia, on Prodolzhal smotret v vodnuiu dal. 
Za proshedshee stoletie pustynnoe polotno dorogi lish koe-gde Peresekli tonkie treshchiny, da i te bolshej chastiu zabilis pyliu i pologimi Peschanymi nanosami, ostavshimisia posle mnogochislennyh dozhdej. Boius, on ot tsbia uzhe ne otviazhetsia, poka ne poluchit zhelaemogo. Bystree, paren. On shiroko ulybnulsia. ejisuminyon XF5FVVtTW1Z0QllXUkAbREVSQFBDXlxbG1JT
